title: Weekend Day Finder
description: Match days that represent the weekend. Weekend days are Saturday and Sunday, and they can be written in full or abbreviated as 'Sat' and 'Sun'.
solutionSummary: This pattern uses alternation with the pipe symbol `|` to match any of the four weekend day options. The anchors `^` and `$` ensure the entire string matches one of these exact options, preventing partial matches.
